1..matched_policy_passage: Definitions. Our privacy policy uses terms that are defined in the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) We have explained these terms below in order to make the privacy policy readable and understandable:(1) Personal data. According to the GDPR, personal data is any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person This includes information such as your name, your date of birth, your address, your email address, your IP address or your telephone number as well as your user behaviour In contrast, information that is not directly linked to your real identity like generally preferred websites by all users or the number of users of a website is not considered personal data

(2) Legal basis for the processing of personal data.
